content: H4TCBPE (8 mg, 0.009 mM) and Pb­(NO3)2 (5.96 mg, 0.018 mM) were mixed with DMF (1.5 mL), ACN (0.5 mL), and water (0.5 mL), and 100 μL of 6 M HCl was added to adjust the pH value. The mixture was sonicated for 30 min and then sealed into a 10 mL Teflon-lined stainless autoclave. The autoclave was heated at 120 °C for three days and cooled slowly to 25 °C. Pale yellow square crystals were collected and washed with DMF, ACN, and water and then dried naturally. The yield was approximately 44.88% [based on Pb­(NO3)2]. Elemental analysis (%) for F3, Calcd: C 60.84, N 2.45, H 4.55; Found: C 60.24, N 2.14, H 4.52. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3421 (w), 3021 (w), 1681 (s), 1604 (s), 1521 (s), 1394 (vs), 1272 (m), 1180 (s), 1112 (s), 1004 (s), 835 (s), 782 (s), 748 (m), 651 (m). CCDC number: 2164308.
clean_text:
Synthesis of {[(CH3)2NH2]2[Pb(TCBPE)(H2O)2]} n  (F3)

H4TCBPE (8 mg, 0.009 mM) and Pb(NO3)2 (5.96 mg, 0.018 mM) were mixed with DMF (1.5 mL), ACN (0.5 mL), and water (0.5 mL), and 100 μL of 6 M HCl was added to adjust the pH value. The mixture was sonicated for 30 min and then sealed into a 10 mL Teflon-lined stainless autoclave. The autoclave was heated at 120 °C for three days and cooled slowly to 25 °C. Pale yellow square crystals were collected and washed with DMF, ACN, and water and then dried naturally. The yield was approximately 44.88% [based on Pb(NO3)2]. Elemental analysis (%) for F3, Calcd: C 60.84, N 2.45, H 4.55; Found: C 60.24, N 2.14, H 4.52. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3421 (w), 3021 (w), 1681 (s), 1604 (s), 1521 (s), 1394 (vs), 1272 (m), 1180 (s), 1112 (s), 1004 (s), 835 (s), 782 (s), 748 (m), 651 (m). CCDC number: 2164308.

processes.composition: H4TCBPE (8 mg, 0.009 mM) and Pb­(NO3)2 (5.96 mg, 0.018 mM)
